data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 30418, Version Hash: 63c35f5155312cb85fc924d827c74351362e0e28
data.actual_result: Upon pressing Enter while the caret is between the "oo" in 🚪, the :do completes to 🚯 or:. Undoing results in an inconsistent state. Redoing a few times results in the following uncaught exception:
data.expected_result: If the caret were inside a complete and correct completeable such as 🔴 and Enter were pressed, the message would be sent as-is. If the completeable were incorrect, but correctable, such as :pes:, the completion tooltip would show 🍇 as it does now, and move the caret after the complete emoji when upon pressing Enter
data.short_description: The emoji, mention and channel tag completer does not recognize when the caret is in the middle of one
data.steps_to_repro: - Type any emoji such as 🚪 in the input - Move the caret anywhere in the emoji and press Tab to complete the emoji - Repeatedly use the Undo hotkey - Repeatedly use the Redo hotkey
